title: Digital behaviors and connectivity trends with Zoom
itunes:title: Digital behaviors and connectivity trends with Zoom
description: In this episode of the User Friendly podcast, host Hanish Patel is joined by Harry Moseley, chief information officer of Zoom Video Communications, and Jana Arbanas, US Telecom, Media & Entertainment leader at Deloitte, to discuss how technologies have altered our daily lives and accelerated demand for a fast-evolving suite of connected digital devices and services.
